data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Somali, Ethiopia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Somali, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Somali. Through your servants plant 1,063 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Somali, Ethiopia.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Somali, Ethiopia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Somali, Ethiopia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Oromo, Hararghe people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Oromo, Hararghe people.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Somali.
Spirit, train the church of Somali, Ethiopia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary:
the state of Somali, Ethiopia has a population of 5,318,000.

We estimate Somali has 955,597 people who might know Jesus, 2,147,908 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,214,495 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Somali with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
